title: Jiminy's Is Fighting Climate Change One Pet Treat At A Time
body: The origin story behind Jiminy's cricket-based, sustainable pet food is only half the story. Anne Carlson tells why she created Jiminy's and who is so excited to have a healthy alternative to ...

title: Looking for a more sustainable dog food? Try insects. | Grist
body: A Q&A with Anne Carlson, the founder and CEO of Jiminy's, on bringing insect-based dog food to the U.S.
